body: I like the new `GenericFormContainer` better. It's a clearer win, in terms of abstraction to me. Nice work with that. There are a couple problems, but I think this is close to ready.
body_text: I like the new GenericFormContainer better. It's a clearer win, in terms of abstraction to me. Nice work with that. There are a couple problems, but I think this is close to ready.
